### Summary
Clear description of the bug.

### Steps to reproduce
Minimal steps or commands to trigger the bug. Include logs/stack traces inside fenced code blocks.

### Expected vs actual
What you expected to happen and what actually happened.

### Environment
- Commit: [e.g. 8f3b9ca]
- Isaac Sim version: [e.g. 4.5/5.1, `cat ${ISAACSIM_PATH}/VERSION`]
- Isaac Lab / isaaclab python package version (if applicable):
- Python version: [e.g. 3.11]
- OS/GPU/CUDA/Driver:

### Additional context
Anything else we should know (configs, assets, screenshots, etc.).

- [ ] I searched existing issues and did not find a match.
